name: The Postmaster
description:
A Small Score-Chaser / Casual Arcade Game. Deliver the letters to their matching coloured house. Deliver Multiple Letters at a time to increase your multiplier and get mad points! 

Controls:

D or Right Arrow to move Clockwise

A or Left Arrow to move Counter Clockwise

S or Down Arrow to Jump through a hole to the other side of the World!

W or Up Arrow to Dash - Charges over time.

This was made for Brackeys' Game Jam 2020.1 

Theme: Holes

This is my first Game Jam Game, any and all feedback is appreciated.  :)
